title.narrative: Promotion of improved and sustainable livelihood opportunities, investment, developing local markets

description.narrative: This is a type 2 project created to support operational activities of CTP team supporting food security and livelihoods projects implemented in different regions and by different partners in South Sudan. CTP South Sudan Country Office has just finalized its 3 years Country Strategy Paper (2020-2023), and this project is intended to support the delivery of projects that will contribute to the realization of Strategic objective 2: Promotion of improved and sustainable livelihood opportunities, investment, developing local market linkages and adoption of modern technology. The key thematic focus area is: Food security with the following objectives: a) Food security is achieved for vulnerable smallholder and subsistence farmers through support to increase diversified food production and productivity, improve livestock and crop farming skills and sustainable agricultural practices including climate resilient agriculture- adapted to climate change. b) Training on consumption of nutritious foods (balanced diet) and prevention of malnutrition, dietary diversity, cooking lessons etc) c) Support in developing local markets, market analysis and market linkages. d) Adoption of new technologies such as solar energy. e) Engage in other diversified livelihood options such as income generating activities especially for women and youths. f) Strengthen agricultural extension services. g) Adopt integral environmental conservation and natural resources management practices.
